heated_split_shot.name: Heated Split Shot
heated_split_shot.description: Delivers an attack with 200 potency. Generates 5 Heat gauge. First hit of the basic combo.

heated_slug_shot.name: Heated Slug Shot
heated_slug_shot.description: Delivers an attack with 300 potency when comboed from Heated Split Shot. Generates 5 Heat gauge.

heated_clean_shot.name: Heated Clean Shot
heated_clean_shot.description: Delivers an attack with 380 potency when comboed from Heated Slug Shot. Generates 5 Heat and 10 Battery gauge.

drill.name: Drill
drill.description: Delivers an attack with 580 potency. High-potency tool on a 20s cooldown. Priority target for Reassemble.

air_anchor.name: Air Anchor
air_anchor.description: Delivers an attack with 580 potency. Generates 20 Battery gauge. 40s cooldown tool.

chain_saw.name: Chain Saw
chain_saw.description: Delivers an attack with 580 potency. Generates 20 Battery gauge. Grants Excavator Ready. 60s cooldown tool.

excavator.name: Excavator
excavator.description: Delivers an attack with 580 potency. Generates 20 Battery gauge. Can only be used after Chain Saw grants Excavator Ready.

reassemble.name: Reassemble
reassemble.description: Guarantees next weaponskill is a critical direct hit. 55s cooldown, 2 charges. Always pair with highest-potency tool.

hypercharge.name: Hypercharge
hypercharge.description: Costs 50 Heat gauge. Enables Blazing Shot for 8s (5 uses at 1.5s GCD). Single-weave only during Hypercharge.

blazing_shot.name: Blazing Shot
blazing_shot.description: Delivers an attack with 220 potency. Generates 5 Battery gauge. Can only be used during Hypercharge. 1.5s GCD.

wildfire.name: Wildfire
wildfire.description: Attaches to target for 10s. Deals 240 potency per weaponskill landed (max 6 hits = 1440 potency). 120s cooldown.

barrel_stabilizer.name: Barrel Stabilizer
barrel_stabilizer.description: Generates 50 Heat gauge instantly. Grants Full Metal Field Ready. 120s cooldown, aligns with Wildfire.

gauss_round.name: Gauss Round
gauss_round.description: Delivers an attack with 130 potency. 3 charges. Upgraded to Double Check at level 92.

ricochet.name: Ricochet
ricochet.description: Delivers an AoE attack with 130 potency. 3 charges. Upgraded to Checkmate at level 94.

double_check.name: Double Check
double_check.description: Delivers an attack with 160 potency. 3 charges, shared with Checkmate. Upgraded from Gauss Round.

checkmate.name: Checkmate
checkmate.description: Delivers an AoE attack with 160 potency. 3 charges, shared with Double Check. Upgraded from Ricochet.

automaton_queen.name: Automaton Queen
automaton_queen.description: Deploys Automaton Queen. Costs 50-100 Battery gauge. Higher Battery = more potency. Deploy during raid buffs for maximum value.

full_metal_field.name: Full Metal Field
full_metal_field.description: Delivers an attack with 580 potency. Can only be used when Full Metal Field Ready is active (granted by Barrel Stabilizer).
